alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Sanpete Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:48PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Outflow winds will impact portions of north central Sanpete...northeastern Juab...southwestern Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 547 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking outflow along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Vernon to 11 miles southwest of Elberta to near Nephi. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Payson, Nephi, Spanish Fork, Santaquin, Salem, Elk Ridge, Woodland Hills, Rocky Ridge, Vernon, Benjamin, Spring Lake, West Mountain, Elberta, Lake Shore, Utah Lake, Mona, Genola, Goshen, Eureka and Jericho. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 220 and 254. US Route 6 between mile markers 118 and 160, and between mile markers 186 and 188. US Route 89 between mile markers 300 and 312. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
